title: Booki
text: Creation of the homepage for a travel agency following a provided mockup. This project allowed me to work on HTML/CSS integration, responsive layout and accessibility best practices.

title: Kasa
text: Development of a real estate rental website with React. I implemented dynamic components (collapses, image gallery, routing) and structured the application following a clear and maintainable architecture.

title: Architect Portfolio
text: Creation of a showcase website presenting the work of an interior architect. The project includes mockup integration, dynamic project management and user interface optimization.
